body:
You never need to insert a new op:

```

a_exp and b_exp

t = eval(a_exp)
if t:
 r = eval(b_exp)
else:
 r = t



a_exp or b_exp

t = eval(a_exp)
if t:
 r = t
else:
 r = eval(b_exp)
```
body_html:
You never need to insert a new op:


a_exp and b_exp

t = eval(a_exp)
if t:
 r = eval(b_exp)
else:
 r = t



a_exp or b_exp

t = eval(a_exp)
if t:
 r = t
else:
 r = eval(b_exp)
